name: Gutt Blaster
overview: A vertically scrolling shooter by Harrie van Lammeren where you are the commander of the interstellar spaceship Gutt Blaster and your assignment is to travel to hyperspace to face myriad alien hordes. The latter possess a powerful wheel shaped spaceship capable of destroying all living life forms. At the beginning of the game a preview will be shown that will highlight the mission to be carried out.
